div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1049 Voikovo (formerly Keterles), 2 km. NW of Kerch', Crimea oblast, Ukraine, 1910 Burial: 330-315 B.C.? (Shelov) Contents: 380 AE. Pot hoard Panticapaeum: AE (as BMC 20?; Minns, pl. 5, 22?) Disposition: museum material lost during war IAK 39 (1911) Suppl., pp. 141-2
